p: The WHC was determined simultaneously. PD1-1 (500 mg, M 0) was dispersed in distilled water (10 mL), stirred, kept at room temperature for 1 h, and centrifuged at 3000 rpm for 10 min. The supernatant was removed, the residue was weighed ( M 1), and the WHC was calculated using the following formula: WHC (g/g) = ( M 1 âˆ’ M 0)/ M 0.
